data.title: Energy and Cogeneration
data.meta_description: Início With over ten years of expertise in Cogeneration Plants, we are one of the biggest specialized companies in the sector in Portugal. We maintain more than 40 cogeneration engines, using natural gas, sewer gas and landfill biogas, delivering a quality service, promptness and minimal losses to our customers. We are specialists in maintenance, sales […]
data.text:
If your business uses thermal energy, a system for the combined production of electrical and thermal energy is what you need to reduce your primary energy consumption and subsequent energy bill of your facility. This will also contribute to the reduction of the environmental impact associated with the production of electrical energy.

In order to make its contribution to the decarbonization of the Portuguese economy, Mota-Engil ATIV will be able to design and install cogeneration plants using Natural Gas/Hydrogen and 100% Hydrogen in the near future.
